# The `ValueMapConfig` Struct Template Reference

## Description {#details}

This class defines the default behavior for configurable aspects of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap&lt;&gt;</a>.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> Configs should inherit from this class to be as compatible as possible with future versions of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a>.

Definition at line 56 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuemap-h">ValueMap.h</a>.

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#a1b685c420b60f4e957db67c7a6c87d5d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">
If FollowRAUW is true, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a> will update mappings on RAUW.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a1b685c420b60f4e957db67c7a6c87d5da802434572dcd90e300fb465562d4f41b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FollowRAUW">
 (= true)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

If it&#39;s false, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a> will leave the original mapping in place.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuemap-h/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuemap-h">ValueMap.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### getMutex() {#a0cad8378a5931a0a1c62af28f0516017}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename ExtraDataT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static mutex&#95;type &#42; llvm::ValueMapConfig&lt; KeyT, MutexT &gt;::getMutex (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> ExtraDataT &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Returns a mutex that should be acquired around any changes to the map.

This is only acquired from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh">CallbackVH</a> (and held around calls to onRAUW and onDelete) and not inside other <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap">ValueMap</a> methods. NULL means that no mutex is necessary.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuemap-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/valuemap-h">ValueMap.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
